thread.title: Night life events: Buffalo Grove home to new Countyline Tavern
thread.title_full: Night life events: Buffalo Grove home to new Countyline Tavern - DailyHerald.com

author: Sara Hooker
title: Night life events: Buffalo Grove home to new Countyline Tavern
text:
Countyline Tavern opens in Buffalo Grove Countyline Tavern opens Monday in Buffalo Grove. The new bar and restaurant serves up American craft fare and all-American craft beers, lagers and ales, as well as imported IPAs and pilsners, stouts and ciders. Lunch hours are 11:30 a.m. to 4 p.m. Monday through Saturday. Dinner hours are 4 to 10 p.m. Sunday through Thursday and 4 to 11 p.m. Friday and Saturday. Countyline Tavern is at 800 W. Lake-Cook Road, Buffalo Grove. (847) 520-7447 or countylinetavern.com .
Martini Room's belly dancing Eastern Groove Studio presents super spooky belly dancing at the Martini Room with shows beginning at 8 p.m. Wednesday, Oct. 14. Wednesday drink specials include five Halloween-themed mini-martinis for $15. October's martini of the month is the pumpkin pie martini for $10. No cover. Martini Room is at 161 E. Chicago St., Elgin. (847) 741-0349 or martiniroomelgin.com .
Thirsty Whale's Da Bears Celebrate football season and Da Bears at the Thirsty Whale Bar. The specials on Sundays remain the same, for better or worse: $4 select shots, $6 Bloody Marys and $10 large cheese pizzas. Thirsty Whale Bar and Grill is at 1700 S. Randall Road, Algonquin. (847) 458-8555 or thirstywhalebar.com .
